channel.title: [508+] Adding Summoning
channel.description:
[code]I am not fully completed with this tutorial because this is a very hard skill to add. I have the files you need though.
1. Find your skills file
2. Create a new folder called "summoning"
3. Download these files and put them in "summoning" http://uppit.com/1u4q3phggara/Summon.class http://uppit.com/2pz1rzc5f47c/SummonTrain.class
4. After you download those files, look in them for
"rs2hd"
5. You will find a bunch of them, change them to how you get to the "summoning" folder
6. After yohave finished all of that. Be patient for me cause I have to find the right files to add.
Sorry. :(
I hope this helps. I am doing my best i promise.[/code]

item.title: [508+] Adding Summoning
item.dc:creator: @neily00 neily00
item.description:
@neily00 wrote:

[code]I am not fully completed with this tutorial because this is a very hard skill to add.
I have the files you need though.

  1. Find your skills file

  2. Create a new folder called “summoning”

  3. Download these files and put them in “summoning”
    http://uppit.com/1u4q3phggara/Summon.class
    http://uppit.com/2pz1rzc5f47c/SummonTrain.class

  4. After you download those files, look in them for

    “rs2hd”

  5. You will find a bunch of them, change them to how you get to
    the “summoning” folder

  6. After yohave finished all of that.
    Be patient for me cause I have to find the right files to add.

Sorry.

I hope this helps. I am doing my best i promise.[/code]
